name: Thief of Princesses
description:
use left mouse button to shoot

use right mouse button to speed up your dragon!

use mouse to look around

URE A DRAGON AND U START YOUR STEALING ROUTINE FROM YOUR DRAGON NEST

YOUR MAIN GOAL IS THIEVERY OF PRINCESSES.
TRY TO STEAL THEM ALL by destroying their castle and biting them!

and DONT FORGET TO GET BACK (return) TO YOUR DRAGON NEST! (with all of them to save your !score!)

(u have to destroy towers and catapults by shooting)

!avoid catapults and bombs!
